article_title: Stock Valuations Go Under the Lens
article_text:
One reason stocks were so troubled last week is that they are getting closer to what Wall Street, in its inimitable slang, calls being "priced for perfection."

Priced for perfection, unfortunately, doesn't mean attractive. It means that stock prices are so high that gains depend on a very favorable investing environment, with strong...
